name: Dark Space Saga: Affliction
description:
2D Platformer submission for project.

Modifications:

  • 3 Original Levels.
  • Script to allow objects to rotate in 2D.
  • Script that allows enemies to jump over specific obstacles.
  • General UI aesthetic changes to fit with theme.

Credit: R.Russell

Note: I am having issues with the WebGL version of the game not having the correct resolution. I have tried fixing this within the player settings but it does not want to cooperate.

If anyone knows of a fix for this. Please let me know. Thank you.
